title: Here’s When to Expect the Jupiter JUP Airdrop for Solana DeFi Users
description: Jupiter’s airdrop draws nearer and nearer. Here’s when the Solana DEX aggregator plans to launch JUP to the community.

title: Osmosis hits $1 billion in monthly volume as interest in Cosmos surges
description:
Cosmos-based DEX Osmosis hit $1.121 billion in monthly volume during December 2023, based on DefiLlama data. The DEX’s native token OSMO has surged on the back of increased activity and is currently trading at $1.51, up 121.97% over the past 30 days, based on CryptoSlate data. It marks the first time the trading volume on […]

The post Osmosis hits $1 billion in monthly volume as interest in Cosmos surges appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ethereum, Chainlink and Arbitrum Are Among Top 5 Altcoin Plays for This Year, According to Michaël van de Poppe
description:
Closely followed crypto strategist and trader Michaël van de Poppe is naming the top five altcoins he is bullish on in 2024. In a new strategy video, Van de Poppe tells his 162,000 YouTube subscribers that his first top altcoin choice this year is the smart contract platform Ethereum (ETH). The post Ethereum, Chainlink and Arbitrum Are Among Top 5 Altcoin Plays for This Year, According to Michaël van de Poppe appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
